What’s Inside

  • bbstar membership program is valid for a duration of 6 months
  • Get free delivery on any order above ₹600, compared to ₹1200 for other bigbasket users
  • Extra discounts on the top products in your city
  • For the first 3 months, get ₹100 cashback on the first order delivery every month

Available in

    Ahmedabad, Anand, Bangalore, Bhopal, Chennai, Chandigarh, Coimbatore, Delhi, Gurgaon, Hosur, Hyderabad, Indore, Jaipur, Kanpur, Kochi, Kolkata, Lucknow, Meerut, Mumbai, Nagpur, Patna, Pune, Surat, Vishakhapatnam

Terms and conditions

  • AURUM Cardholders get bbstar 6-month membership absolutely free
  • Only Primary card holders of AURUM are eligible for bbstar Membership
  • Make your first transaction using your AURUM Card to avail bbtar membership within 12 working days.
  • Use E-code via SMS on bbstar App to activate the membership
  • bbstar membership will be valid for 6 months from the date of availing the offer
  • This code is applicable only for new members.
  • The code apply now option is available at bbstar signup page.
  • Offer applicable only on BigBasket app and m-site
  • No payment required to avail the offer
  • Cannot be clubbed with any other offer
  • BigBasket has right to cancel membership if found to be of fraudulent nature
  • BigBasket reserves the right to change / modify / add / delete any of the terms & conditions of the offer at any time without notice
  • SBI Card & bbstar shall not be liable if any partner has temporarily or permanently shut down its operations.
